nodes.text: The electroprod trooper, also known as the electroprod stormtrooper, or prisoner control stormtrooper,was a variant of the First Order stormtrooper that was active during the war against the Resistance. They were outfitted with electroprods and First Order stormtrooper armor and were trained to react to social unrest.
At least one was deployed to Pasaana and helped capture the Resistance member Chewbacca.

The electroprod trooper appeared in the 2019 saga film Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker. It was first revealed by WIRED in a YouTube video of Doug Chiang and Madlyn Burkert explaining nearly all live-action clone trooper and stormtrooper designs.
